title: Ticket #111: Merge OSG ProcD into Condor
description:
The ProcD that ships with the VDT is a fork of the one that exists in Condor. The code for the OSG ProcD is on V7_1-procd_osg-branch in the Condor Git repository. The wiki page OsgProcd describes the OSG ProcD in further detail. The functionality added for the OSG ProcD should be merged back into Condor. This mainly includes:

  • Better logging and configuration in the ProcD thanks to it being linked with the standard Condor libraries.
  • The ability to specify a GID to use for tracking a family, rather than having the ProcD allocate one to use.

Before merging this in, I think it'd be wise to change the ProcD to run with Condor's UID in PrivSep mode (See #110: Change ProcD to run without root privilege).
